title: IBM security advisory (AV26-050)
description: Between January 19 and 25, 2026, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following:
products: IBM Big SQL on IBM Cloud Pak for Data  multiple versions
IBM Guardium Data Security Center  version 3.8.5
IBM Watsonx Orchastrate with watsonx Assistant Chartridge UAB Component  versions 5.1.0 to 5.2.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
